name: Let's Start At The Beginning
description:
-A short game that explores themes of guilt and penance. We had a fun time building it out. We aimed for the visual here and the small number of interactive elements hopefully help drive the story forward.

-Roam around and explore, things might not be apparent at first glance!

-The behavior and some of the animations were created from scratch while all the models and some animations were sourced from the following sources:-

Man model -Renderpeople's 3d models https://free3d.com/user/renderpeople Woman Model- same baby model -Kim Larsen https://free3d.com/user/kim Demon crawlers- True horror asset Witch-A-Twin studios Devil https://www.cgtrader.com/wgarymalay Walls,ceilings,some furniture-Hospital- Horror Pack DNK_DEV :https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/18994 Devil's key - All4Maphttps://clara.io/view/a2d2cf6b-b0ab-4709-8cba-7823663e3b22 Wood and wall textures from -https://www.texturecan.com/ TV- Aleksey https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/37465 Furniture free pack -https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/15 DEXSOFT-Games Kitchen3d model- Patistone https://free3d.com/user/patistone https://free3d.com/3d-model/kitchen-476687.html Wall lamp models- https://free3d.com/3d-model/lamp-lighting-485156.html Bulb-https://www.pngwing.com/en/free-png-bpamx/download Mixamo -Animations

Special thanks to: Dishant Kaushik for the videos for the TV and other media content!
